import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' // Mount Nabvar.css import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assests/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assests/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' const Navbar = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState("shop") const {getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("men")}}>Men{menu==="men"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("women")}}>Women{menu==="women"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
getTotalCartItems()
) } export default Navbar
